text: Kare-ra (shito-tachi) wa itta. `Rūto yo hontōni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Kare-ra wa kesshite anata ni te o fureru koto wa dekinai. Sorede yoru no ma ni anata no kazoku o tsurete dete iki nasai. Soshite anata gata no naka, ichi-ri demo ushiro o furimuite wa naranai. Anata no tsuma wa betsudearu. Ka no on'na wa, kare-ra (sodomu no jūmin) no sōgū shita koto ni sōgū surudearou. Kare-ra ni sadame rareta toki wa, sōchōdearu. Asa wa chikaide wanai ka
